rooms.description: Large foyer with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows on the western facade.
Spacious living room adjoining the entrance hall, featuring elegant Art Deco furniture and extensive use of glass for an open feel.
Dining area with an emphasis on symmetrical layout aligning with Vastu principles.
Well-equipped kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and Art Deco accents.
Functional washroom area on the ground floor for guests and service access.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows designed to optimize natural light while considering Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Main entry door with reinforced design and Art Deco detailing.
